'Brill' () (known as 'E. J. Brill', 'Koninklijke Brill', 'Brill Academic
Publishers') is an international academic publisher founded in 1683 in Leiden,
Netherlands. With offices in Leiden and Boston, Brill today publishes more than
134 journals Brill Annual Report 2010, p.20 and around 600 new books
and reference works each year. In addition, Brill is a provider of primary
source materials online and on microform for researchers in the humanities and
social sciences through its imprint IDC Publishers.
